      • subscribe

        public java.lang.String subscribe(java.lang.String lastName,
                                  java.lang.String firstName,
                                  java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String borndate,
                                  java.lang.String managerPwd)
                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                  ExistingSubscriberException,
                                  SubscriberException,
                                  BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        register a subscriber (person).
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        lastName - the last name of the subscriber.
        firstName - the first name of the subscriber.
        username - the username of the subscriber.
        borndate - the borndate of the subscriber.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Returns:
        password for the new subscriber.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if a subscriber exists with the same username.
        SubscriberException - raised if subscriber is minor.
        BadParametersException - raised if last name, first name, username or borndate are invalid or not instantiated.

                        java.lang.String managerPwd)
                 throws AuthenticationException,
                        ExistingSubscriberException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        delete a subscriber. His currents bets are canceled. He looses betted tokens.
        Specified by:
        unsubscribe in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the subscriber.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Returns:
        number of tokens remaining in the subscriber's account
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if username is not registered.

      • addCompetition

        public void addCompetition(java.lang.String competition,
                           java.util.Calendar closingDate,
                           java.util.Collection<Competitor> competitors,
                           java.lang.String managerPwd)
                    throws AuthenticationException,
                           ExistingCompetitionException,
                           CompetitionException,
                           BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        add a competition.
        Specified by:
        addCompetition in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        closingDate - last date to bet.
        competitors - the collection of competitors for the competition.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if a competition with the same name already exists.
        CompetitionException - raised if closing date is in the past (competition closed); there are less than two competitors; two or more competitors are the same (firstname, lastname, borndate).
        BadParametersException - raised if name of competition is invalid; list of competitors not instantiated; (firstname, lastname, borndate or name if a team competitor) of one or more of the competitors is invalid.

      • addCompetitor

        public void addCompetitor(java.lang.String competition,
                          Competitor competitor,
                          java.lang.String managerPwd)
                   throws AuthenticationException,
                          ExistingCompetitionException,
                          CompetitionException,
                          ExistingCompetitorException,
                          BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        add a competitor to a competition.
        Specified by:
        addCompetitor in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        competitor - infos about the competitor.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if the closing date of the competition is in the past (competition closed).
        ExistingCompetitorException - raised if the competitor is already registered for the competition.
        BadParametersException - raised if the (firstname, lastname, borndate or name if team competitors) of the competitor is invalid.

      • deleteCompetitor

        public void deleteCompetitor(java.lang.String competition,
                             Competitor competitor,
                             java.lang.String managerPwd)
                      throws AuthenticationException,
                             ExistingCompetitionException,
                             CompetitionException,
                             ExistingCompetitorException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        delete a competitor for a competition.
        Specified by:
        deleteCompetitor in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        competitor - infos about the competitor.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if the closing date of the competition is in the past (competition closed) ; the number of remaining competitors is 2 before deleting.
        ExistingCompetitorException - raised if the competitor is not registered for the competition.

      • creditSubscriber

        public void creditSubscriber(java.lang.String username,

                             ExistingSubscriberException,
                             BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        credit number of tokens of a subscriber.
        Specified by:
        creditSubscriber in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        username - subscriber's username.
        numberTokens - number of tokens to credit.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if the subscriber (username) is not registered.
        BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens is less than (or equals to) 0.

      • debitSubscriber

                            java.lang.String managerPwd)
                     throws AuthenticationException,
                            ExistingSubscriberException,
                            SubscriberException,
                            BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        debit a subscriber account with a number of tokens.
        Specified by:
        debitSubscriber in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        username - subscriber's username.
        numberTokens - number of tokens to debit.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if the subscriber (username) is not registered.
        SubscriberException - raised if number of tokens not enough.
        BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens is less than (or equals to) 0.

      • settleWinner

        public void settleWinner(java.lang.String competition,
                         Competitor winner,
                         java.lang.String managerPwd)
                  throws AuthenticationException,
                         ExistingCompetitionException,
                         CompetitionException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        settle bets on winner.
        Each subscriber betting on this competition with winner a_winner is credited with a number of tokens equals to:
        (number of tokens betted * total tokens betted for the competition) / total number of tokens betted for the winner
        If no subscriber bets on the right competitor (the real winner), the tokens betted are credited to subscribers betting on the competition according to the number of tokens they betted. The competition is then deleted if no more bets exist for the competition.
        Specified by:
        settleWinner in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        winner - competitor winner.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if there is no competitor a_winner for the competition; competition still opened.

      • settlePodium

        public void settlePodium(java.lang.String competition,
                         Competitor winner,
                         Competitor second,
                         Competitor third,
                         java.lang.String managerPwd)
                  throws AuthenticationException,
                         ExistingCompetitionException,
                         CompetitionException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        settle bets on podium.
        Each subscriber betting on this competition with the right podium is credited with a number of tokens equals to:
        (number of tokens betted * total tokens betted for the competition) / total number of tokens betted for the podium
        If no subscriber bets on the right podium, the tokens betted are credited to subscribers betting on the competition according to the number of tokens they betted. The competition is then deleted if no more bets exist for the competition.
        Specified by:
        settlePodium in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        competition - the name of the competition.
        winner - the winner.
        second - the second.
        third - the third.
        managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if two competitors in the podium are the same; no competitor (firstname, lastname, borndate or name for teams) a_winner, a_second or a_third for the competition; competition still opened

      • betOnWinner

        public void betOnWinner(long numberTokens,
                        java.lang.String competition,
                        Competitor winner,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String pwdSubs)
                 throws AuthenticationException,
                        CompetitionException,
                        ExistingCompetitionException,
                        SubscriberException,
                        BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        bet a winner for a competition
        The number of tokens of the subscriber is debited.
        Specified by:
        betOnWinner in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        numberTokens - number of tokens to bet.
        competition - name of the competition.
        winner - competitor to bet (winner).
        username - subscriber's username.
        pwdSubs - subscriber's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if (username, password) does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if there is no competitor a_winner for the competition; competition is closed (closing date is in the past); the player is a competitor of the competition.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        SubscriberException - raised if subscriber has not enough tokens.
        BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens less than 0.

      • betOnPodium

        public void betOnPodium(long numberTokens,
                        java.lang.String competition,
                        Competitor winner,
                        Competitor second,
                        Competitor third,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String pwdSubs)
                 throws AuthenticationException,
                        CompetitionException,
                        ExistingCompetitionException,
                        SubscriberException,
                        BadParametersException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        bet on podium
        The number of tokens of the subscriber is debited.
        Specified by:
        betOnPodium in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        numberTokens - number of tokens to bet.
        competition - the name of the competition.
        winner - winner to bet.
        second - second place.
        third - third place.
        username - subscriber's username.
        pwdSubs - subscriber's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if (username, password) does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if there is no competitor with name a_winner, a_second or a_third for the competition; competition is closed (closing date is in the past); the player is a competitor of the competition.
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if the competition does not exist.
        SubscriberException - raised if subscriber has not enough tokens.
        BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens less than 0.

        • subscriber's lastname

        • tokens betted

      • deleteBetsCompetition

        public void deleteBetsCompetition(java.lang.String competition,
                                  java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String pwdSubs)
                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                  CompetitionException,
                                  ExistingCompetitionException
        Description copied from interface: Betting
        delete all bets made by a subscriber on a competition.
        subscriber's account is credited with a number of tokens corresponding to the bets made by the subscriber for the competition.
        Specified by:
        deleteBetsCompetition in interface Betting
        Parameters:
        competition - competition's name.
        username - subscriber's username.
        pwdSubs - subscriber's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if (username, password) does not exist.
        CompetitionException - raised if closed competition (closing date is in the past).
        ExistingCompetitionException - raised if there is no competition a_competition.
